Title: Bait
Writer: Shayne Armstrong (additional writing by), Duncan Kennedy (additional writing by), John Kim, S.P. Krause (additional writing by), Justin Monjo (additional writing by), Russell Mulcahy
Actors: Richard Brancatisano, Xavier Samuel, Chris Betts, Sharni Vinson
Plot: A freak tsunami traps shoppers at a coastal Australian supermarket inside the building - along with 12-foot Great White Sharks.
